tests.name: should successfully scan a repository
tests.description: Verifies complete repository scanning including README, package.json, languages, and AI analysis

tests.name: should handle missing README gracefully
tests.description: Ensures the analyzer works when README is not available

tests.name: should extract primary languages correctly
tests.description: Validates language extraction and sorting by usage

tests.name: should detect frameworks from package.json
tests.description: Tests framework detection from dependency analysis

tests.name: should generate a complete persona
tests.description: Validates full ICP persona generation with all required fields

tests.name: should include repository analysis in persona
tests.description: Ensures repository data influences persona generation

tests.name: should handle generation errors with fallback
tests.description: Tests graceful degradation when AI fails

tests.name: should merge updates into existing persona
should discover relevant subreddits based on persona
tests.description: Tests AI-powered subreddit discovery from persona data

tests.name: should sort subreddits by relevance score
should filter out subreddits with low subscriber count
tests.description: Ensures quality threshold for subreddit suggestions

tests.name: should search for subreddits by keyword
should assign higher scores to moderately-sized communities
tests.description: Validates relevance scoring favors active communities

notes: All core Phase 3 services have comprehensive test coverage
Tests use mocks for external APIs (GitHub, OpenAI, Reddit)
Error handling and fallback scenarios are tested
Integration tests should be added for API routes
E2E tests should be added for UI components with Playwright
